name: GRAVITY Pilot!
description:
My entry for the Bolt Jam #6. I didn't write a single line of C# code for this.

MISSION

You are the last Gravity Pilot! Help the Earth to collect important research by moving on from planet to planet while keeping watch on your fuel.

Controls
  • W - Accelerate
  • D  - Turn right
  • A - Turn left
  • Shift - Speed up time
  • Space - Self-explode
Assets used
  • Bolt
  • Fx Explosion Pack
  • Universal Sound FX
  • NASA public domain textures (not an asset though)
Everything else was done by me during the Jam including:
  • Game Design
  • Music
  • Custom Shaders (Planets, Space
  • Bolt graphs (incl. custom physics engine for planet and rocket physics)
  • Planet look (NASA textures -> Blender custom shader -> Render -> LWRP Shader Graph)
  • Rocket texture
